channel.title: Adding ramdoms and cutting oak tree
channel.description:
hi when i try to make a DTM to cut a oak tree it mucks up and hits the nomal tree
and how do i add randoms
can you tell me how?

item.title: Adding ramdoms and cutting oak tree
item.dc:creator: @dudeofthed dudeofthed
item.description:
@dudeofthed wrote:

[quote=“bobbymoore64, post:3, topic:69004”]ok thanks SRL

and bit map will not work as its too big and tht[/quote]
On trees in Runescape. I have noticed that all they’re have different leaves and colours. Try to use a bitmap that is about 40x40 on the leaves.

Read full topic
item.source: Adding ramdoms and cutting oak tree

item.title: Adding ramdoms and cutting oak tree

item.description:
@dudeofthed wrote:

[quote=“bobbymoore64, post:1, topic:69004”]hi when i try to make a DTM to cut a oak tree it mucks up and hits the nomal tree

and how do i add randoms

can you tell me how?[/quote]
For Randoms you use SRL, by including srl and that certain skill you want.
For cutting trees i am not quite sure, but can’t you make a bitmap.
